text: My one mistake was not cutting off your head before casting you off that cliff..
A mistake I shall not make again.. As no mutant may call themselves bloodkin of High King Ulfric Grondal..
MARAUDERS! Abolish the mutant filth, for Skjold! for the Bjornling!
It's a cowardice trap! Scouts report Aranessa Saltspite has been spotted in the woods, she is sure to charge! Protect your flanks
Destroy the Pirate Raiders and claim the Crown of Skjold
Hrothgar Olveksan, one of the Bjornling Jarls has arrived! Hail the Bloodwolf! CHARGE!
They charge head on, yet your blooddaughter is no where to be found! Saltspite's first mate Ogg Halfheart leads the lines. brace yourself and hold your ground!

Upon Skjold's icy expanse, High King Ulfric Grondal confronts an encroaching peril – the notorious pirate queen, Aranessa Saltspite, once his own flesh and blood. With doubt shadowing his rule, Ulfric mounts a desperate defense to reaffirm his kingship and sever the familial ties turned tumultuous. The clash becomes a crucible, where Ulfric strives to erase the stain of the past and reassert himself as the unyielding High King of the Bjornling Tribe, choosing the icy battlefield as the stage for a bitter reunion.

Fit for a ruler who bridges the realms of men and Bjornlings, the Crown of Skjold bears imperial grace. Adorned with engraved jewels, this regal artifact exudes authority. Yet, beneath its refined exterior lies a formidable power — the wearer commands unwavering loyalty from all Bjornling tribes, a testament to the unity forged in the icy crucible of Skjold's unforgiving lands
